mapper.select: select c.id, c.title, c.cover, c.lesson_num as lessonNum, s1.title as subjectLevelOne, s2.title as subjectLevelTwo, t.name as teacherName, c.price from edu_course c left join edu_subject s1 on c.subject_parent_id=s1.id left join edu_subject s2 on c.subject_id=s2.id left join edu_teacher t on c.teacher_id=t.id where c.id=#{courseId}
